sentence: Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick (R-Pa.) who had worked in Kyiv as an FBI agent, handed out Ukrainian flags, while Rep. Mike Quigley (D-Ill.), whose district has a strong Ukrainian American community, distributed blue-and-yellow ribbons.
title: Ukrainian ambassador gets standing ovation, as Biden praises Ukraine’s strength in State of the Union

sentence: He believes Russian exports must face sanctions worldwide, and we must target Russian energy and ban all of their imports into the U.S. Fitzpatrick also believes the U.S. must sanction "everybody that's anywhere near remotely affiliated" with Putin and his regime, including their family members.
author: Joe Schoffstall
title: Putin's desire to bring back Soviet Union, advanced age driving invasion, Ukraine caucus co-chair says

title: Kaine: Fighter jets to Ukraine not the admin’s ‘red line’
